item.title: [KAFKA-9714] Flaky Test SslTransportLayerTest#testTLSDefaults
item.description:
https://builds.apache.org/job/kafka-pr-jdk11-scala2.13/5145/testReport/junit/org.apache.kafka.common.network/SslTransportLayerTest/testTLSDefaults_tlsProtocol_TLSv1_2_/

java.lang.AssertionError: Metric not updated failed-authentication-total expected:<0.0> but was:<1.0> expected:<0.0> but was:<1.0> at org.junit.Assert.fail(Assert.java:89) at org.junit.Assert.failNotEquals(Assert.java:835) at org.junit.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:555) at org.apache.kafka.common.network.NioEchoServer.waitForMetrics(NioEchoServer.java:194) at org.apache.kafka.common.network.NioEchoServer.verifyAuthenticationMetrics(NioEchoServer.java:156) at org.apache.kafka.common.network.SslTransportLayerTest.testTLSDefaults(SslTransportLayerTest.java:571)
